ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = "Corporate_Partnership", ISCHANGED(StageName), ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE(StageName) ,"Contract"), OR(ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Discontinued"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Executed")), ISBLANK( CLMS_Contract_ID__c ) )
